channel.title: Is delta THAT bad?
channel.description: okay, i did mention something about this yesterday but this is a different question. what makes delta so bad? and whats so good about all the other ones? can someone PLEASE tell me what the easiest one to code it? and still get good resultS? i've been using delta for absolutley ages and find nothing wrong with it but when i look at what other people have done in delta they just get loads of hate, because its delta! so... whats the best/easiest type of server? and is there any guide 'converting' from delta to 'best server here'? if anyone replys, then thatnkyou very much! from iJBGFX :D

item.title: Is delta THAT bad?
item.dc:creator: @Nasz Nasz
item.description:
@Nasz wrote:

[quote=“Blood-Killers, post:46, topic:390746”][quote author=noobs are ftw link=topic=486689.msg3567297#msg3567297 date=1302747861]
Rs wasn’t 317 in 2007 it was in the 400s
[/quote]

Well the times before wildy and free trade was banished. That’s when Runescape was at it’s prime, it’s just not the same anymore even with wildy + free trade back.[/quote]

Honestly, you couldn’t of said that better… I agree, even with free trade and wildy, it’s just not the same.

Read full topic

item.title: Is delta THAT bad?
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“Spades, post:37, topic:390746”]Here is my Delta, just recently got back into coding.



I have been re-doing a lot of things, mainly working on prayer right now. I have almost full prayer with headicons loading from the cache. It is currently running off of a 317 deob with 317 cache. I plan on keeping it that way. I have been thinking of releasing it in the future. Delta is bad, but good at the same time. It has bugs in it but they are bugs that make you code to fix them. It teaches you more then if you were to download a PI server.[/quote]I’d play that Delta to be honest, though I hate Delta servers.

Read full topic

item.title: Is delta THAT bad?

item.description:
@Mack_n_cheese wrote:

depends. delta can be complete shit or a very good stable serber.

item.title: Is delta THAT bad?
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

I would prefer using deltascape to using PI any day of the week.

Also, out of all the easy bases to start with, I think that battlescape is one of the best, mainly because it has so few bugs.

Read full topic

item.title: Is delta THAT bad?
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

Here is my Delta, just recently got back into coding.



I have been re-doing a lot of things, mainly working on prayer right now. I have almost full prayer with headicons loading from the cache. It is currently running off of a 317 deob with 317 cache. I plan on keeping it that way. I have been thinking of releasing it in the future. Delta is bad, but good at the same time. It has bugs in it but they are bugs that make you code to fix them. It teaches you more then if you were to download a PI server.

Read full topic

item.title: Is delta THAT bad?
item.dc:creator: @mrcrispypwn mrcrispypwn
item.description:
@mrcrispypwn wrote:

If you are looking for a challenge go to revisions in the 500-600. You said EASY with good results so maybe project insanity? Its really popular with tons of tuts. I’m currently doing 614 a basic source I’m improving.

Read full topic

item.title: Is delta THAT bad?
item.dc:creator: @mark033 mark033
item.description:
@mark033 wrote:

For people who just casually code servers I don’t see why it’s necessary to use something with efficient networking and packaging. I think a lot of people on this board are a bit too pre-occupied with being good at Java and using “good” sources. Most people aren’t going to be able to make something good enough to attract enough people anyway, and those people aren’t going to be doing any serious Java coding period.

Read full topic

It’s easy to use, and you can modify it heavily.

item.title: Is delta THAT bad?
item.dc:creator: @Blood-Killers Blood-Killers
item.description:
@Blood-Killers wrote:

[quote=“demon fox337, post:22, topic:390746”][quote author=Blood-Killers link=topic=486689.msg3566366#msg3566366 date=1302689295]
Everybody says Delta is bad, each to there own. I personally love Delta and if it’s programmed correctly it is amazing! There have been many great to
[/quote]

ofc that is a big if lol 75% of deltas ive seen had horrid programming infact i only know one good one and im currently trying to find bugs in it…[/quote]

Well almost all server have bugs in them, but if you know what your doing in a Delta based server, they can actually be decent.

Read full topic

item.title: Is delta THAT bad?
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

xxxtilllyxxx:

^^Everything he said but garbage networking, horrible packaging, everything is crammed into client.java. It’s just a waste of time. When starting, i’d recommend using something like shard’s, PI, Emulous or Hyperion. They are all way better and you learn alot more.

Read full topic

item.title: Is delta THAT bad?
item.dc:creator: @xxxtilllyxxx xxxtilllyxxx
item.description:
@xxxtilllyxxx wrote:

^^Everything he said but garbage networking, horrible packaging, everything is crammed into client.java. It’s just a waste of time. When starting, i’d recommend using something like shard’s, PI, Emulous or Hyperion. They are all way better and you learn alot more.

Read full topic

item.title: Is delta THAT bad?
item.dc:creator: @Fire_capez Fire capez
item.description:
@Fire_capez wrote:

Bad networking.
Terrible stability.
Un-object oriented, and Java is an oop language.
Doesn’t follow conventions.
No documentation.
Tons of dead code.

Read full topic

item.title: Is delta THAT bad?
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

No, you have to do more than “add” them, you have to make a whole shop system. Stick with Graham’s Hyperion.

Read full topic

item.title: Is delta THAT bad?
item.dc:creator: @didy_dooda didy dooda
item.description:
@didy_dooda wrote:

yeha, im downloading another hyperon atm, and im gonna stay at it allllll day even if i just manage to add one teleport or a shop i will be happy thanks people <3

Read full topic

item.title: Is delta THAT bad?
item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

In my opinion moving from Delta to Hyperion is quite difficult i would suggest using something with decent networking and isent hated on if you use it for example shard you could learn how the packaging works which would help you with Hyperion and you could also get a chance to move up from a shitty base to a pretty decent base

Read full topic

item.title: Is delta THAT bad?

item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

didy dooda:

okay, thanks for the tips, i downloaded a hyperion server and have been looking through it for the past 2 hours and cant figure anything out

Keep at it, quitters don’t win and winners don’t quit.
